Package model

Class SteuerLogik

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • model.Actor
        • model.SteuerLogik
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public final class SteuerLogik
extends Actor
    Controller for all Ampeln and WellenGeneratoren implemented as a Singleton
    Version:
    2018-11
    Author:
    Team 4

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      private class  SteuerLogik.OverflowTicker
      A private inner Class that is used to regulate which Ampel set or WellenGenerator is next has a central integer that is incremented until it reaches a given maximum when it is incremented and becomes larger than the maximum, it returns to value 0

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler
